titles.title: National Ag Science Center Act of 2006
A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to make grants to facilitate the establishment of the National Ag Science Center in Stanislaus County, California.
National Ag Science Center Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: National Ag Science Center Act of 2006 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to provide to the entity known as "Ag Science Center, Inc.," in Stanislaus County, California, grants to pay not more than a total of 33% of the total costs of establishing the National Ag Science Center.
